Rotation.RotationList: [Misc] Init|[Misc] Pause|[Misc] Bossmod|Selfheal|Pillar of Frost|Raise Dead|Plague Leech (BP < 1 or FF < 1)|Outbreak (no BP or no FF)|Unholy Blight (no BP or no FF)|Soul Reaper|Blood Tap (Soul Reaper)|Howling Blast (no debuff)|Plague Strike (no debuff)|Howling Blast (Rime)|Obliterate (KM)|Blood Tap (KM)|Blood Tap (>10 and RP > 76)|Frost Strike (RP > 76)|Obliterate (Blood = 2 or Frost = 2 or Unholy = 2)|Plague Leech (BP < 3 or FF < 3)|Outbreak|Unholy Blight|Frost Strike (RE and Frost = 0)|Frost Strike (BC <= 10)|Horn of Winter|Frost Strike (no RC)|Obliterate|Blood Tap (>10 and RP >= 20)|Frost Strike|Plague Leech|Empower Rune Weapon
Rotation.RotationNotes:
left Shift - Pause Rotation left Ctrl - Switch Howling blast on/off left Alt - Switch DnD on/off
right Ctrl - Switch cooldown mode auto/boss only
